*Not to be confused with [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM")'s [sabre-toothed cat](/wiki/Sabre-toothed_cat "Sabre-toothed cat") or [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack")'s [saber-toothed cat](/wiki/Saber-toothed_cat "Saber-toothed cat").*

The **saber-toothed tiger**, f, is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is the most dangerous member of the ​f [cat or other feline](/wiki/Feline "Feline") class that can be encountered in the game.

## Generation

Saber-toothed tigers are only randomly generated in the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm").

## Encyclopedia Entry

The saber-toothed tiger, a common term for a member of the genus Smilodon, is perhaps the most well-known of the saber-toothed cats. Notable for the long, dagger-like fangs from which the name of the genus is derived, these apex predators stalked mammoths, bison, and other large herbivores across the plains of prehistoric North America.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Saber-toothed_tiger\&action=edit)*

html:
Saber-toothed tiger

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
f saber-toothed tiger (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 4d4
f saber-toothed tiger (No tile)
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Claw 3d4, Claw 3d4, Bite 4d4

Base level 12
Base experience 203
Speed 14
Base AC 2
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1000
Nutritional value 600
Size Huge
Resistances cold
Resistances conveyed None

A saber-toothed tiger:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 508

Not to be confused with SLASH'EM's sabre-toothed cat or dNetHack's saber-toothed cat.

The saber-toothed tiger, f, is a monster that appears in EvilHack. It is the most dangerous member of the ​f cat or other feline class that can be encountered in the game.

Generation

Saber-toothed tigers are only randomly generated in the Ice Queen's Realm.

Encyclopedia Entry

The saber-toothed tiger, a common term for a member of the genus Smilodon, is perhaps the most well-known of the saber-toothed cats. Notable for the long, dagger-like fangs from which the name of the genus is derived, these apex predators stalked mammoths, bison, and other large herbivores across the plains of prehistoric North America.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

''Not to be confused with [[SLASH'EM]]'s [[sabre-toothed cat]] or [[dNetHack]]'s [[saber-toothed cat]].''

The '''saber-toothed tiger''', {{yellow|f}}, is a [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. It is the most dangerous member of the {{monclass|f}} class that can be encountered in the game.

==Generation==
Saber-toothed tigers are only randomly generated in the [[Ice Queen's Realm]].

==Encyclopedia Entry==

{{encyclopedia|
The saber-toothed tiger, a common term for a member of the genus Smilodon, is perhaps the most well-known of the saber-toothed cats.  Notable for the long, dagger-like fangs from which the name of the genus is derived, these apex predators stalked mammoths, bison, and other large herbivores across the plains of prehistoric North America.
